name: Fair Value Gaps (FVG)
description: Identifies imbalances in price action where gaps exist between candle wicks
reason: Core ICT/SMC concept - price tends to fill FVGs, useful for entry/exit zones

signals.bullish_fvg: Gap between candle 1 high and candle 3 low
signals.bearish_fvg: Gap between candle 1 low and candle 3 high
signals.filled: Price returns to fill the gap
